Text.val: Generates a random password which can be used to provide a Factorlink user or a client user with an initial, secure, password
Length of the password to be generated is specified here as a parameter (could be setting)
If parameter pi.checkonly is TRUE the program will only check if the password passed to this program in pio.password is
compliant with ING password policy rules . If this is not the case error returened in po.error is set to: 1
GB338 should not be asked to generate passwords with less than 10 characters for security reasons
In case of a problem the password returned will be empty
Initialize our array with allowed special characters ..
error#1: password not compliant with ING Password policy rules ...
We assume a preceedes z and between a and z there's all lowercase latin letters
Generate a string with 10 lowercase letters ....
Replace one of the lowercase letters by uppercase ...
Replace one of the lowercase letters to a digit between 0 and 9
Replace one of the lowercase letters to special character from our list of special characters in v.SpecialChars_Arry
Check if pi.password is compliant with ING password policy rules ...
get next char ....
check if uppercase letter ...
check if lowercase letter ...
check if digit ...
not a letter, not a digit => must be a special character
No we analyzed the password and can check if the password is compliant ..
